entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 19.
